Description:
Detects SyncAppvPublishingServer process execution which usually utilized by adversaries to bypass PowerShell execution restrictions.

Author: Ensar Åžamil, @sblmsrsn, OSCD Community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: SyncAppvPublishingServer Bypass Powershell Restriction - PS Module
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where contextinfo like '%syncappvpublishingserver.exe%'
